title: Strengthening HR Management Competencies in Practice: Basics of Monitoring Powder Accumulation in Semiconductor Exhaust Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Students can explain the basic principles of ultrasonic sensors and the powder accumulation detection mechanism
Students can visualize collected data and interpret thickness estimation results
Students can achieve over 90% accuracy in powder thickness classification using a simple machine learning model
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
